sentences.en: " Give me a little something, will you, mister? "
sentences.cn: “ 求求你给我一点施舍好吗, 先生?

sentences.en: " I wish I'd said Mister Williams.
sentences.cn: “ 我刚才提他时,要是带上‘先生’二字就好了.

sentences.en: " Mr " is the abbreviation of " Mister ".
sentences.cn: “ Mr ” 是 “ Mister ” 的缩写.

sentences.en: A mister is characterized by greed.
And I tell you now, mister , that nobody should blame the generals.
sentences.cn: 现在我可以告诉你, 不应怪罪将军们.

sentences.en: But in the meantime -- just look at them, mister, hanging up there.
sentences.cn: 不过,现在, 嗯 —— 伙计, 你看,它们静静地高悬在上空.
他自称是 " 清廉先生 ".

sentences.en: I don't put much faith in Mister Thompson.
sentences.cn: 我不那么相信汤普森先生.

sentences.en: Look, Mister, we know our job, so don't try to tell us what to do.
sentences.cn: 嘿，先生，我们知道自己该干什么，不用你指挥。

sentences.en: Mister Smith is my good friend.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生是我的好朋友.

sentences.en: Mister, can we 'elp to carry yer stuff in?
sentences.cn: 先生，要我们帮您把行李拿进去吗？

sentences.en: Please, mister, can we have our ball back?
sentences.cn: 求求你，先生，能把球还给我们吗？

sentences.en: Should he be styled " Right Honorable " or " Mister "?
sentences.cn: 应该称他为 " 阁下 " 还是 " 先生 "?

sentences.en: Well , I admit , mister, I didn't see that final shoot - out with my own eyes.
sentences.cn: 哦, 不过, 我并没亲眼看到那最后的嚣闹.也幸好如此.

sentences.en: You've come to the right shop , mister!

trans.tran_en: Men are sometimes addressed as mister, especially by children and especially when the person talking to them does not know their name
